statements: SELECT * FROM customer_churn_analysis;
SELECT customer_id, churn_status FROM customer_churn_analysis;
SELECT * FROM customer_churn_analysis WHERE churn_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, demographic_info FROM customer_churn_analysis ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, churn_status, usage_data->>'last_month' AS last_month_usage FROM customer_churn_analysis WHERE churn_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM customer_churn_analysis WHERE churn_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, demographic_info FROM customer_churn_analysis ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, usage_data->'app' AS app_usage FROM customer_churn_analysis WHERE churn_status = FALSE ORDER BY app_usage DESC;
SELECT MAX(LENGTH(demographic_info->>'name')) AS max_name_length FROM customer_churn_analysis;
SELECT AVG(jsonb_array_length(usage_data->'logins')) AS avg_logins FROM customer_churn_analysis WHERE churn_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, churn_status FROM customers WHERE churn_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM usage_data WHERE service_type = 'Internet' ORDER BY usage_duration DESC;
SELECT customer_id, usage_date, usage_duration FROM usage_data WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, city FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM usage_data WHERE usage_duration > 500 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT name, city FROM customers JOIN usage_data ON customers.customer_id = usage_data.customer_id WHERE service_type='Internet' AND churn_status = true;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, account_created_date FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS total_usage FROM usage_data GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_name, churn_probability FROM customers JOIN churn_predictions ON customers.customer_id = churn_predictions.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, account_created_date FROM customers WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY account_created_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, gender, usage_minutes FROM customers c JOIN usage_data ud ON c.customer_id = ud.customer_id WHERE ud.data_date = '2022-08-15'

SELECT customer_name, churn_probability FROM customers c JOIN churn_predictions cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY churn_probability DESC
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender FROM customers;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM usage_data WHERE usage_type = 'internet' ORDER BY usage_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, location, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, prediction_date, churn_probability, predicted_churn FROM churn_prediction ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, location, income, education_level FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, u.usage_date, u.usage_type, u.usage_amount FROM customers c JOIN usage_data u ON c.customer_id = u.customer_id WHERE u.usage_amount > 100 ORDER BY u.usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users
SELECT age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT activity_date, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT prediction_date, churn_probability, prediction_result FROM churn_prediction WHERE churn_probability > 0.5
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE age > 30
SELECT username, email, activity_type FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_id, customer_type, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age_group IN ('18-25', '26-35')
SELECT prediction_id, customer_id, churn_probability FROM churn_prediction WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT user_id, usage_date, feature_usage FROM usage_data ORDER BY usage_date DESC
